pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aids in Processing and Plotting Data from a Lemna-Tec Scananalyzer // Extracts traits from imaging data produced using a Lemna-Tec Scananalyzer (see http://www.lemnatec.com/products/hardware-solutions/scanalyzer- 3d for more information). Growth rates between successive imagings are obtained and those for a nominated set of intervals can also be calculated. Profile or longitudinal plots of the traits and growth rates can be produced. These allow one to check for anomalous data and to explore growth patterns in the data.
